bioconda.name: oases
bioconda.summary: De novo transcriptome assembler for short reads

biocontainers.name: oases
biocontainers.summary: De novo transcriptome assembler for short reads

biotools.summary: De novo transcriptome assembler designed to produce transcripts from short read sequencing technologies. It uploads a preliminary assembly produced by Velvet, and clusters the contigs into small groups, called loci. It then exploits the paired-end read and long read information, when available, to construct transcript isoforms.

bioschemas.name: Oases
